summary: 调用DeleteVpc接口删除一个专有网络VPC（Virtual Private Cloud）。

schema.description:
要删除的VPC所在的地域ID。

您可以通过调用[DescribeRegions](~~36063~~)接口获取地域ID。

是否强制删除VPC。取值：

- **true**：强制删除。
- **false**（默认值）：不强制删除。

当VPC下仅存在以下资源时可强制删除VPC：
- 该VPC下仅存在IPv4网关及指向IPv4网关的路由。
- 该VPC下仅存在IPv6网关及指向IPv6网关的路由。

是否只预检此次请求。取值：
- **true**：发送检查请求，不会删除专有网络VPC。检查项包括是否填写了必需参数、请求格式、业务限制。如果检查不通过，则返回对应错误。如果检查通过，则返回错误码`DryRunOperation`。
- **false**（默认值）：发送正常请求，通过检查后返回HTTP 2xx状态码并直接进行删除。

400.errorMessage: The DhcpOptionsSet status of vpc  does not support this operation.
The VPC contains endpoints and cannot be deleted.
Current VPC status does not support this operation.
Specified object has dependent resources
Specified object has dependent resources
Specified object has dependent resources
Specified object has dependent resources SecurityGroup.
Specified object has dependent route interface .
Specified object has dependent tunnel.
Specified object has dependent resources NatGateway.
Specified object has dependent resources RouterInterface.
Specified VPC can not found.
Active custom route in vpc.
The eip operate too frequent, TaskConflict.
The VPC has been connected to the classic network ECS. Please cancel the connection before proceeding.
%s
Current CBN status does not support this operation.
Specified object has dependent custom routeTable.
Specified object has dependent resources network acl.
%s
Specified object has active classicLink instance.
System is busy, please try later.
The VPC cannot be deleted when it is associated with dhcpOptionsSet.
The specified region is not found.
CustomRouteTable already exists.
The VPC cannot be deleted when it has ipv4Gateway.
Specified object has dependent resources gatewayRouteTable.
The operation is not allowed because the VpcPeer exists.
Specified object has dependent resources app access.
Failed to delete the VPC because it has peer router interfaces.
Specified object has attached to Transit Router.

403.errorMessage: The operation is not supported in this status.

500.errorMessage: The request processing has failed due to some unknown error.

title: 删除一个VPC
description:
调用该接口删除VPC时，请注意： 

- 删除VPC之前，需要先释放或转移VPC内的所有资源，包括交换机、云产品实例、高可用虚拟IP等。
  
- 只有处于**Available**状态的VPC才可以被删除。  

- **DeleteVpc**接口属于异步接口，即系统会返回一个请求ID，但该VPC尚未删除成功，系统后台的删除任务仍在进行。您可以调用[DescribeVpcAttribute](~~94565~~)查询VPC的删除状态：
    - 当VPC处于**Deleting**状态时，表示VPC正在删除中。
    - 当查询不到指定的VPC时，表示VPC删除成功。
- **DeleteVpc**接口不支持并发删除同一个VPC。
